name: Garlic Knots
description: Freshly baked, soft garlic knots served with marinara sauce.

name: Parmesan Fries
description: Crispy fries tossed with parmesan cheese and herbs, served with a side of garlic aioli.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Golden brown mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, shaved parmesan cheese, and croutons, tossed in a classic Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: Mixed greens, cucumbers, red onions, kalamata olives, and feta cheese, tossed in a lemon herb vinaigrette.

name: BBQ Wings
description: Crispy wings tossed in tangy BBQ sauce.

name: Honey Mustard Wings
description: Crispy wings tossed in sweet and tangy honey mustard sauce.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Crispy wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce.

name: Lemon Pepper Wings
description: Crispy wings tossed in zesty lemon pepper seasoning.
